Title: A Bag of Marbles
Writer: Jonathan Allouche (original screenplay), Christian Duguay (adaptation), Christian Duguay (dialogue), Christian Duguay (screenplay), Alexandra Geismar (original screenplay), Benoît Guichard (adaptation), Benoît Guichard (dialogue), Benoît Guichard (screenplay), Joseph Joffo (novel), Laurent Zeitoun (collaboration)
Actors: Dorian Le Clech, Batyste Fleurial, Patrick Bruel, Elsa Zylberstein
Plot: The adventure of a Jewish boy and his brother escaping Nazi persecution in occupied France.
